name: DARK SHOOTER-TOGETHER WE CAN KILL
description:
THIS IS THE GAME BASED ON THE BAD ELEMENTS . THE ENEMIES TOGETHER WANTS TO KILL THE PLAYER AND TO WIN THE GAME . IN THIS WAY THEY ARE SHOWING THE POWER OF TOGETHERNESS. THEY WANT TO SAY , "WE ARE DARK ... WE ARE STRONGER TOGETHER" . 

THIS GAME IS FOR THE BRACKEYS GAME JAM . 

GAME BY : RITIK MISHRA (KAAL)  

ANY FEEDBACK IS APPRECIATED...
